title: Day 739
content:
# Day 739

Play chess, not checkers.

<iframe src="https://cdn.embedly.com/widgets/media.html?type=text%2Fhtml&key=a19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07&schema=twitter&url=https%3A//twitter.com/ConceptualJames/status/1774101584307200270%3Fs%3D20&image=" title="" height="281" width="500"></iframe>

Although there is much darkness and cruelty in this world, we must strive to respond with compassion and forgiveness, just as Jesus asked God to forgive those who crucified him. Rather than being provoked by evil acts, we should turn inward and focus on cultivating understanding, wisdom, and inner peace within ourselves. By doing so, we can be beacons of light that dispel hatred and negativity, inspiring others through our own acts of kindness and grace.

Christ is King :)

3/30/24

Conor Jay Chepenik
